desc: Spawns monsters in a variety of configurable ways.
name: Monster Spawner

desc: Place in an enclosed building with at least one door and light source and someone will move in!
name: ^yellow;Colony Deed

desc: A creature capture pod can be placed into this device, tethering the pet within its radius.
name: Pet Tether

desc: Spawn your very own Apex villager!
name: Apex Spawner

desc: Spawn your very own Avian villager!
name: Avian Spawner

desc: Spawn your very own Floran villager!
name: Floran Spawner

desc: Spawn your very own Glitch villager!
name: Glitch Spawner

desc: Spawn your very own human villager!
name: Human Spawner

desc: Spawn your very own Hylotl villager!
name: Hylotl Spawner

desc: A station used to obtain employment beacons that call in all kinds of helpers.
name: ^orange;Employer's Station^white;
